snippet.title: BioGun - Official Release Date Trailer | The MIX x Kinda Funny Spring Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Check out action-packed gameplay against various enemies and bosses in this latest trailer for BioGun. In this upcoming twin-stick shooter Metroidvania game, you dive into your dog's body, explore a colorful microscopic world, and set out to save dog-kind. BioGun will be available on PC via Steam on April 16, 2024. In BioGun, save humanity's best friend. Prove that you’re the vaccine that can put an end to the pet-demic. What are you waiting for? Put on your hazard suit and blast some viral scum! The fate of dog-kind is in your hands!
